channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Today's podcast: Let's not waste this crisis. We can fix a lot of things that have been waiting since the end of the Civil War. https://t.co/Halr8HKYTU
@whengoodenough nothing i said would prevent that, in fact since there are no states it should be even easier.
The case against the Supreme Court of the United States. https://t.co/nCUM9HrB4M
@memeorandum @jbarro Actually it's up to everyone to make them pay for it.
The Biggest Change in Media Since Cable Is Happening Right Now. https://t.co/8OweXU1RmD
@MatteoBalzani because they had no cause to do what they just did.
@Royalty thank you.
1. Get rid of states. We don't need them. They don't work now, if they ever did.
look if you think there are any rules about what the supreme court can and can't do you're not paying attention. https://t.co/qZNyFyfqCj
@MatteoBalzani they don't give a fuck if they can do something or not, they're just doing whatever.
BTW the first episode of Loot is as good as you would think because the star is Maya Rudolph. https://t.co/mCqN9BMLcV

Things to cancel: 1. Supreme Court. 2. Electoral College. 3. Senate. 4. States. The we have this: representative government. We can reinstate the Supreme Court after all the rest is done, with a much larger cast, and term limits. Think big!
@roonoid yes i see it that way too.
Winston Churchill: “Never let a good crisis go to waste." https://t.co/OuaQlC8G3j percentE2 percent80 percent9CNever-let-a-good-crisis-go-to-waste- percentE2 percent80 percent9D
@AmazonHelp except i never asked it to send me these stinking notifications in the first place.

i hate random pieces of software who treat you like a friend sending text messages, so you pick up the phone only to realize oh it's amazon photos who found a photo just like one i took three years ago and have no recollection of.
Let's add four new liberal justices to the Supreme Court immediately after the election.
I bet there will be a Supreme Court decision that makes abortion illegal everywhere.
The Dishonesty of the Abortion Debate. https://t.co/Pj6BvYjvf0
“They cannot help as long as the fetus is alive thanks to the anti-abortion law,” she wrote only hours before she died. “A woman is like an incubator.” https://t.co/Snd86A3viP
Reconstruction should’ve eliminated the electoral college and the senate, maybe even states. https://t.co/qr6wfSp5V6
